SEARCH
Package Articles.Managers

Class WordManager

java.lang.Object
Articles.Managers.WordManager
public class WordManager extends Object
This class is responsible for doing operations / calculating statistics with the words in an article

    • getMostUsedUniqueWords

      public ArrayList<ArticleWord> getMostUsedUniqueWords(int timesSeen)
      Article must have its uniqueWords loaded before calling this method
      Parameters:
      timesSeen - The minimum number of times a word must have been seen to be included in the list
      Returns:
      The most used unique words in the article

    • readStopWords

      private void readStopWords() throws Exception
      Reads the stop words from StopWords.txt
      Throws:
      Exception - - If the file cannot be read or if the file does not exist

    • removePunctuation

      public ArrayList<String> removePunctuation(ArrayList<String> contents)
      Removes punctuation from the contents of the article
      Parameters:
      contents - The contents of the article
      Returns:
      The contents of the article with punctuation removed
